attributes.action: pay cap on travel for nurses & social workers to be greater than the 3500miles
attributes.additional_details: Please contact me if anyone wishes to discuss
attributes.background: To do my job i need to travel , i support service users  with a learning disability to appointments and tray to help fulfil their lifes. Due to me working in a rural area my travel is very high and i rrach my limit of 3500 miles very quickly. So for a mumber of months i am out of pocket.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

This is set by the NHS Staff Council, which consists of employers, the Government and Trades Unions.

You can find out more here:

https://www.nhsemployers.org/your-workforce/pay-and-reward/nhs-staff-council
